casebody.data:
Rosario GAMBINO and Joseph Lima, Plaintiffs in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 21, 1927.) No. 142. Irving K.' Baxter, of Utica, N. Y., for plaintiff in error. “ Oliver D. Burden, U. S. Atty., of Syracuse, N. Y.

Before MANTON and LEARNED HAND, Circuit Judges, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment of conviction affirmed.
